extension.valueString: International Classification of Diseases, 10th Revision, Clinical Modification (ICD-10-CM)

name: Icd10CM

contact.name: National Center for Health Statistics/Centers for Disease Control and Prevention

description: The International Classification of Diseases, 10th Revision, Clinical Modification (ICD-10-CM), describes the classification of morbidity and mortality information for statistical purposes and for the indexing of healthcare records by diseases. The ICD-10-CM codes can be used as the value of the Act.cd attribute.

uniqueId.comment: Published for many years in HL7 Standards, but has now been superceded.   Retained here for backwards-compatibility and convenience.
This is the URL as specified by the terminology owner, and is considereed authoritative.
